rabbit.http
Class HttpHeader

java.lang.Object
  rabbit.http.GeneralHeader
      rabbit.http.HttpHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Header>, Storable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpHeaderWithContent
public class HttpHeader
extends GeneralHeader

A class to handle http headers.

Author:
Robert Olofsson

public byte[] getBytes()
Convert this header to a byte[]. The header lines are converted to US-ASCII and any content is appended.

Returns:
the content of this header

isDot9Request

public boolean isDot9Request()
Is this request a HTTP/0.9 type request? A 0.9 request doesnt have a full HTTPheader, only a requestline so we need to treat it differently.

Returns:
true if the request did not have any http version
